page.text: Introduction

Mariculture provides various different ways to breathe/work underwater better. From the simplicity of simply extended air supply with the Snorkel to the full out Ocean Exploring usefulness of the Scuba Gear.
Snorkel
Snorkels are your basic Diving gear, they will extend the length of time you can stay underwater, providing you small amounts of air every now and then.
Air Pump

Air Pumps are what you are going to need in order to be able to use the Diving Gear to Breathe Underwater. Once crafted you are going to place it down somewhere near where you want to Dive, they have a range of 64 blocks each way when powered by hand, or 40 when powered by a machine. As said, you can either activate Air Pumps by right clicking them or by powering with RF. On activation, the air pump will supply air to anyone wearing a Diving Helmet and Air Supply that is within range.

Air Pumps require a fair amount of the space around them to be air blocks. You can check if your Air Pump is located in a decent spot by shift right clicking with an empty hand. This will cause particles to display, if they are green you are good to go!
Diving Gear
Diving Gear is also fairly basic, it has the four pieces the Helmet, Air Supply, Suit and the Boots. To utilise to the full potential you are going to also need an Air Pump.
The Pieces
Here's a list of the function of each piece of the Diving Gear.
Diving Helmet
This when used in conjunction with an Air Pump and air supply will help you breathe underwater. It also also brightens up your vision underwater slightly.
Air Supply
Required to assist with breathing underwater in conjunction with Diving Helmet and an Air Pump.
Diving Suit
Diving Pants work like Aqua Affinity and make you mine faster when underwater.
Diving Boots
The Diving Boots cause your player to walk through water faster, at roughly the same speed as on land.
Scuba Gear
Scuba gear is more advanced, and if you want access to it's underwater breathing you are going to need to construct an Air Compressor.
The Pieces
Here's a list of the function of each piece of the Scuba Gear.
Scuba Mask
Scuba Masks, when used with Scuba Tanks let you breathe underwater, they also can make your vision clearer underwater. (You can shift right click them so the vision works on land too!)
Scuba Tank
These when filled with air via an Air Compressor, will provide you with Oxygen underwater as long as you also have a Mask.
Wetsuit
Wetsuits seriously increase your mining speed underwater.
Flippers
Flippers make you move significantly faster in water, and will set you in to fly mode in deep water.
Air Compressor

Air Compressors are used to fill up your Scuba Tanks with Oyxgen. They convert RF in to Air, so you must supply them with power, you can do this directly or by right clicking with a battery. They are made of 2 Compressor Tops on top of, 2 Compressor Base. And Built kind of like 2 double chests stacked on top of each other.

Overtime they will produce air from the RF, and you can see an indicator of how much air is inside by the bar that shows up. Once there is enough air, you right the block with your Scuba Tank and it will fill it up with the air. They hold 2 Tanks worth.
